item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? Name: Christopher Vest Profession: DevOps Engineer Location: London, UK What is this? This is my personal website. Why? In December 2018, I read an article discussing how a personal website could replace Facebook. Over the last few years I have become increasingly frustrated with social media - as such I was intrigued with this idea. I decided to give it a go, with the intention of perhaps phasing out other forms of social media entirely.

item.title: Using Vault PKI with the Strimzi Kafka Operator on Kubernetes
item.description:
Securing Kafka can be difficult. Securing Kafka on Kubernetes can also be diffult. But using Strimzi’s Kafka Operator makes it easy!

Below you will find a guide on how to use the Vault PKI secrets engine to generate an intermediate CA to use with the Strimzi Kafka Operator.
